name: Threat Grid
description: This app supports executing investigative actions to analyze executables and URLs on the Threat Grid sandbox

base_uri.description: Base URL to Threat Grid service

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity. This action logs into the device to check the connection and credentials
Run the file in the Threat Grid sandbox and retrieve the analysis results
actions.verbose: This action requires the input file to be present in the vault and therefore takes the vault id as the input parameter.

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to detonate

playbook.description: ThreatGrid Playbook to run on the submitted file

sample_password.description: Password used to open the submitted file

example_values: MS Windows 95 Internet shortcut text (URL=<test.com>), ASCII text

actions.description: List the submissions present on ThreatGrid based on the query provided

query.description: Query text to search in the submissions

limit.description: Limit for number of records to fetch (default: 100)
